message: Update version to 0.6.10.
Run formatter and clean up some comments.
Migrate TJA chart component to use JSX.
Migrate note stats component to use JSX.
Migrate web components to JSX (WebJSX) and fix panel expansion regression.
Fix panel auto-expansion logic and add regression test.
Refactor difficulty and branch selection UI as a web component.
Update snapshot due to version change.
Update LICENSE
Update version to 0.6.9.
Add "neu update" to Neutralino build scripts.
Refactor annotate tab content as a web component.
Refactor select tab content as a web component.
Opt into Biome HTML formatting.
Refactor Judgements tab to Web Component.
Refactor the changelog button and panel as a web component.
Refactor 'view' tab options into a Web Component.
Refactor 'Save Image' button into a Web Component.
Minor formatting fix.
Separate some functions from the init function under main.ts.
Rearramge top level directories and add descriptions to README.
Move tests to tests directory.
Update version to 0.6.8.
Apply formatting and clean up.
Move logic from main to separate components by pruning unused symbols from main and its copies.
Create copies of main.ts to preserve git history for refactoring.
Fix snapshot from version update.
Update version to 0.6.7.
Update README.
Enable Biome noUnusedImports and address reported issues.
Enable Biome noUnusedVariables and address reported issues.
Fix more Biome linting issues and fix a regression on branch selector display.
Fix more Biome linting issues.
Address some Biome linting suggestions.
Apply automatic formatting with the Biome formatter.
Add Biome formatter and npm command for formatting.
Update version to 0.6.6.
Update the test stream start button as a stop button when the stream is active.
Fix the issue where gogo time status may be incorrect at the beginning of chart.
Clear judgements when switching charts.
Allow customization of gap length in chart exporting. Update outdated snapshots.
Update version to 0.6.5.
Hide note stats by default in vertical layout mode.
Improve chart list visuals.
Add functionality to specify the name of the exported selection chart.
Fix incorrect gogo time configuration in chart exporting.
Update version to 0.6.4.
Update default judgement display to underline. Display a grey underline for misses.
Move loop controls to Judgements tab and update tests.
Refactor rendering to separate layout calculation from drawing, implement optimized incremental rendering for judgements, and cache layout for interaction events.
Implement incremental rendering and batched updates.
Update note stats tooltip snapshot.
Update version to 0.6.3.
Update font stack for better Japanese text rendering.
Fix note hovering for branching charts when the note is not in a branching part.
Make sure all branch starting points are highlighted if there are multiple before a branch end.
Fix note stats display and hovering when there are multiple branches.
Add dark mode support.
Update version to 0.6.2.
Add Japanese language support and improve font rendering.
Update ESE chart list to show all items by default and indicate truncation. Add translations for search UI.
Add a hover note style when note stats display is enabled.
Keep the footer at the bottom in horizontal layout and if there is empty vertical space in the control column.
Refactor note stats display as a separate component. Add and fix some test cases.
Update version to 0.6.1.
Update TJAChart placeholder/error messages to be rendered as a div element instead of using canvas.
Merge remote and test stream tabs into a single 'Stream Input' tab.
Merge "example data" and "ESE" tabs into a single "chart list" tab.
Hide annotations when the annotation tab is not active.
Hide the collapse loop button if the chart is not compatible
Fix note-selected test case by using chart-only.html
Update judgement display test cases to use chart-only page.
Update annotation tests to use chart-only page and clean up snapshots.
Refactor annotation tests to use chart-only page and extract auto-annotation logic.
Fix component registration in chart-only mode and resolve test flakiness.
Introduce a separate page for the rendered chart only and use it for some test cases.
Refactor rendered chart to Web Component with polyfill support.
Update version to 0.6.0.
Fix unwanted left padding when the branch selection is wrapped into a new row.
Slightly increase the width of controls column in horizontal layout.
Fix the issue of sticky chart options and notes stats panel in vertical layout.
Increase left padding of chart canvas in horizontal layout to avoid overlap with toggle button.
In horizontal layout, move the footer from the chart column to the controls column.
Basic support of horizontal UI layout, which leaves more vertical space for the rendered chart.
Update version to 0.5.0.
Exapnd auto annotation to cover some notes in changing color in the middle or end of a segment.
Introduce the concept of note segmentation and use it to refine automatic hand annotation note selection.
Basic auto hand annotation functionality.
Update selected note style to have a yellow border.
Add save image button to judgement and annotate tabs.
Update version to 0.4.0
Add over extended region with fade out effect to the start and end of each bar line.
Add a grey background color to rendered chart. Update barlines to white. Make branch start vertical line color extend over the top of bar.
Support rendering all branches stacked.
Refactor: extract color constants to PALETTE and update chart background.
Use bar strip for Gogo time and background color for branching.
Fix bug where #MEASURE in branches caused incorrect branch parsing.
Update version to 0.3.3.
Add missing localization for branching.
Add placeholder text replacing rendered chart for chart branching and for the initial state after remote stream connection.
